component.name: Manuskript
component.summary: An open source tool for writers

description.p: Manuskript provides a rich environment to help writers create their first draft and then further refine and edit their masterpiece.

ul.li: Grow your premise from one sentence, to a paragraph, to a full summary
Construct outlines (Outline mode and/or Index cards)
Edit and re-organize chapters and scenes
Compose with fiction or non-fiction templates and writing modes
Import and export document formats such as HTML, ePub, OpenDocument, DocX, and more
